sub_title: Country General Manager at IMCD Bangladesh | Strategic | Transformational Leader | Sales | Business Development | Strategic Partnerships
summary:
Business Professional with 15+ years of proven track records in leadership role of Strategic Planning, Business Development and Sales.

Key Highlights:
- Expert in Leadership, Organizational Strategy, New projects & Partnerships 
- Expert in Business Development, Sales, Trade Marketing, Business Transformation
- Expert in building High Performance Team
- Consistent award winning professional performance across MNCs
- Versatile experiences in multiple categories/roles/geographies
- Forerunner on new projects/initiatives
